Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® Multiple Sample Luer Adapter
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Venous access devices with female luer connectors
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Venous blood collection via luer adapter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer® Multiple Sample Luer Adapter, a sterile, single-use luer adapter for venous blood collection in tubes or culture bottles
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to be connected with BD Vacutainer® needle holders to enable blood collection from venous access devices into blood collection tubes or culture bottles for in vitro diagnostic testing by healthcare professionals
